front.title: Continuity of Care Record (CCR) action plan

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This document is the action plan to improve the suitability of ASTM Continuity of Care Record (CCR) to support the Department of Health and Human Services' Stage 1 Meaningful Use. Lantana Consulting Group prepared this report for the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) to accompany the related "CCR Suitability Analysis".

seriesInfo.name: NIST GCR; NIST grant-contract report; NIST grant contract report
